full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` PHYI SKAL MED RNAMS LA TSIG GIS RGYA, NANG DAD MED RNAMS LA SNGAGS KYIS RGYA, ,GSANG DAM MED RNAMS LA BSRUNG MAS RGYA, ,RGYA RIM PA GSUM LAS MA 'DAS SHIG ,` KLONG GSAL RDO RJE SNYING PO LAS, ,RIGS 'DUS BLA MA'I DKYIL 'KHOR DU, ,BSKYED RDZOGS RDZOGS PA CHEN PO'I KHRID, ,MDOR BSDUS RANG GI BRJED BYANG LAGS, ,` THOS SO GTZO BOR BYED PA YI, ,DENG DUS SPYOD 'CHAL SKYE BU YI, ,MIG DANG RNA BA'I YUL MIN PAS, ,GSANG BAR BYA BA DAM TSIG GO , GSANG TE SGRUB NA DNGOS GRUB MYUR, ,MA GSANG MKHA' 'GRO'I BKA' CHAD YOD, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @020B (CES PA 'DI NI LHA MI 'GRO BA KUN @021A *, ,GYI RIGS KYI COD PAn SNGAGS 'CHANG MES PO GRUB THOB 'KHOR BSGYUR GDOD MA'I RANG GROL DPAL BZANG POS RDZOGS PA CHEN PO'I BRJED BYANG BRI NAS MA RDZOGS PA LA MJUG MTHUD NAS RDZOGS DGOS ZHES, ,MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHE 'JAM DBYANGS BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I MAndAL LHA REG DANG BCAS BKA'I BSKUL MA GNANG BA'I NGOR, RANG GI NGOS NAS SKYES SBYANGS KYI SHES YON DMAN KYANG RDO RJE 'CHANG DNGOS BLA MA RNAMS KYI DRIN LAS 'OD GSAL RDZOGS PA CHEN PO'I CHOS LA CUNG ZAD GZHOL BA'I SNGAGS BTZUN RDO RJE MTSAN GSUM MAM KARMA DON GRUB KYIS KHRID SKABS KYI GSUNG BSHAD LAS BLO LA GANG ZIN SEMS BSKYED NAS BZUNG RDZOGS PA'I PAR DU BKA' BZHIN BSGRUB PA'I MCHOD PAR 'BUL BA'I YI GE PA NI GANG GI DRIN GYIS ZAB CHOS KYI GRAL DU ZHUGS PA'I KARMA DRAG PO RTZAL GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE 'DIS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, SEMS CAN RNAMS BDE CHEN SA LA TSE 'DIR MYUR DU BGROD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,RGYA RGYA RGYA , ,,)
